plushies.name: Bashful Beige Bunny (Small)
plushies.description: A classic soft beige bunny with long ears and a sweet expression, perfect as a starter Jellycat.

plushies.name: Bashful Pink Bunny (Medium)
plushies.description: A rosy pink bunny that is popular for gifts, cuddles, and nursery decor.

plushies.name: Bashful Navy Bunny (Medium)
plushies.description: A deep navy bunny that stands out beautifully on a shelf of lighter plush toys.

plushies.name: Amuseable Avocado
plushies.description: A cheerful avocado with corduroy legs and a big stitched smile.

plushies.name: Amuseable Croissant
plushies.description: A flaky croissant plush with soft layers and tiny feet, perfect for breakfast-themed displays.

plushies.name: Amuseable Slice of Pizza
plushies.description: A fun and quirky slice of pizza plush that tends to sell out quickly.

plushies.name: Fuddlewuddle Elephant
plushies.description: A snuggly elephant with a textured, ruffled fur pattern.

plushies.name: Cordy Roy Fox
plushies.description: A fox with corduroy-style ridged fur and a friendly face.

plushies.name: Bashful Black & Cream Puppy
plushies.description: A loyal-looking puppy plush that is a classic Jellycat companion.

plushies.name: Snowflake Bunny
plushies.description: A winter-themed bunny with subtle sparkle details.

plushies.name: Amuseable Christmas Pudding
plushies.description: A festive pudding plush with holly on top and corduroy legs.

plushies.name: Blossom Tulip Bunny (Small)
plushies.description: A floral-eared bunny with a tulip pattern, very popular in spring collections.

plushies.name: Amuseable Rainbow
plushies.description: A bright rainbow plush with legs that brings happy color to any shelf.

plushies.name: Bashful Silver Bunny (Large)
plushies.description: A large, luxurious silver bunny that becomes a statement piece.

plushies.name: Maple Bear
plushies.description: A warm-toned bear that is harder to find, making it a fun hunt for collectors.
